pkgmetadata.longdescription: Difference-in-Differences in Heterogeneous Adoption Designs with Quasi Stayers // Estimation of Difference-in-Differences (DiD) estimators from de Chaisemartin and D'Haultfoeuille (2024) doi:10.2139/ssrn.4284811 in Heterogeneous Adoption Designs with no stayers but with quasi stayers.
